title: KATLoader 1.0.2.0 (Automated  Torrent Uploader)
description:
The current version of my program, KATLoader.
 
This program is used to upload torrent towebsite.
 

Features are as follows:

Smart Naming (sets the name as the torrent file minus '.torrent')
Every Category On KAT Supported (all 64 or so of them)
Ability To Quickly Upload Images To Imgur.com (FINALLY)
Keyboard Shortcuts For Making Description (creds to  gazza-9116837 for the idea and base)
Ability To Save Your Userhash (So you don't gotta find it every time)
Link To This Thread (so you don't have to find it every time lol)
.NET 4.0 Support
REQUIRES a KickAss Torrents Userhash!!
Drag & Drop .torrent / image files
Size / Color text editing
Add a tag to your torrent (fe "This is the torrent title - thisisthetag"
Flawless saving / loading of userhash and tag
Updated about form (now has links to everyone's KAT profiles)
Auto-Update check on start
Auto-Settings load on start (hash & tag)
TAG NOW WORKS lol. I think. I'm 99% sure it does
Empty out description box on upload
Auto-Magic Uploader (huzzah)
Update checker (many thanks to  Tinker7164 for allowing me to use his WEBSITE to host the update files)
 
Please note that I am not currently developing a version for TPB. I would if I was verified, but nope haha.
 
Please do enjoy and give feedback :)
 
~ RG.REBOOT
